Enter and kneel. You've been chosen! What is your wish?
I want to build a maze and construct puzzles.
What do you serve?
I serve the Labyrinth.
What do you tell people?
That the Labyrinth hides amazing technologies, cultures and artefacts, all at the reach of those, who overcome deadly traps.
Yes, let other adventurers continue in the never-ending cycle. Then we'll be free.
